title: ‘The Marvels’ Box Office Projections Are Bad News For Marvel
description:
The Marvel Cinematic Universe is moving forward this November with a brand-new follow-up to Captain Marvel. The new MCU sequel, titled The Marvels, is set to follow the events of the aforementioned blockbuster in addition to the Disney Plus series Ms. Marvel. Unfortunately, The Marvels is facing low box office projections ahead of its November […]

title: Stephen King’s Most Bizarre Story Might Be Getting A New Adaptation
description:
